headline: A Look At Williams-Sonoma (WSM) Valuation After Recent Share Price Moves
summary: Williams-Sonoma stock snapshot after recent moves Williams-Sonoma (WSM) has drawn fresh attention after recent trading, with the share price closing at $214.57 and short term returns mixed, including a 3.8% gain over the past day and a small weekly decline. See our latest analysis for Williams-Sonoma. The recent 3.8% 1 day share price gain sits against a softer 7 day share price return of 2.8%, while the 90 day share price return of 18.3% and 3 year total shareholder return of about 2.5x...
